translations: n.（Bringer）人名；（德）布林格尔；（法）布兰热

phrs.translation: 芬兰, 带来者, 名字
灵魂使者, 魂灵使者
末日守卫, 带来厄运, 带来了厄运
恶魔右腕, 召魔者, 恶魔之手
看那产生的光芒, 看那光明使者

sentences.sentence: He was the bringer of good news.
Seven was another significant number, usually regarded as a bringer of good luck.
sentences.translation: 7是另一个重要的数字，通常被认为会带来好运。

sentences.sentence: So the Chinese dragon was a bringer of good fortune.
sentences.translation: 因此中国的龙是带来好运的动物。
